name: Decembrood
description:
Try to stem the tide of the Decembrood as it crushes the spirit of Halloween!

A simple top-down shooter, made in Godot for the Spooktober 2021 jam. There were plans to actually implement a sacrifice mechanic, but time ran out.

WASD to move, hold a mouse button to fire.

All assets made in great haste and greater flailing by me, except the font: https://fontlibrary.org/en/font/marius1

(Game can really chug played in browser, so threw a downloadable version if people really want a better frame rate.)
